name: Nod-Krai: An Elysium of Moonlight and Wanderings (I)

achievements.name: Moondust Treasure Hunter (I)
achievements.desc: Open 60 chests on Lempo Isle, Hiisi Island, and Paha Isle.

achievements.name: Moondust Treasure Hunter (I)
achievements.desc: Open 120 chests on Lempo Isle, Hiisi Island, and Paha Isle.

achievements.name: Moondust Treasure Hunter (I)
achievements.desc: Open 240 chests on Lempo Isle, Hiisi Island, and Paha Isle.

achievements.name: Moondust Adventurer (I)
achievements.desc: Complete 3 Open World mechanism-activated Time Trial Challenges on Lempo Isle, Hiisi Island, and Paha Isle.

achievements.name: Moondust Adventurer (I)
achievements.desc: Complete 6 Open World mechanism-activated Time Trial Challenges on Lempo Isle, Hiisi Island, and Paha Isle.

achievements.name: Moondust Adventurer (I)
achievements.desc: Complete 10 Open World mechanism-activated Time Trial Challenges on Lempo Isle, Hiisi Island, and Paha Isle.

achievements.name: Shine Bright Like the Moon
achievements.desc: Upgrade the Statues of the New Moon in Nod-Krai to their maximum level.

achievements.name: Joint Meeting Point Construction: Final Night Cemetery
achievements.desc: Reach maximum Construction Level at the Final Night Cemetery.

achievements.name: Joint Meeting Point Construction: Clink-Clank Krumkake Craftshop
achievements.desc: Reach maximum Construction Level at the Clink-Clank Krumkake Craftshop.

achievements.name: Joint Meeting Point Construction: Frostmoon Enclave
achievements.desc: Reach maximum Construction Level at the Frostmoon Enclave.

achievements.name: Continental Explorer: Moonlit Isles (I)
achievements.desc: Light up the maps of the following areas in Nod-Krai: Lempo Isle, Hiisi Island, and Paha Isle.

achievements.name: The Weaver in the Ossuary
achievements.desc: Explore the sanctum sealed off by the first Moonchanter.

achievements.name: Frosty Groves Beyond the Darkness (I)
achievements.desc: Unlock all Teleport Waypoints in the following areas in Nod-Krai: Lempo Isle, Hiisi Island, and Paha Isle.

achievements.name: The Sins of the Fathers
achievements.desc: Complete the adventure at the Kuuvahki Experimental Design Bureau.

achievements.name: Sanctuary Pilgrim: Moonlit Isles (I)
achievements.desc: Unlock all the Shrines of Depths in the following areas in Nod-Krai: Lempo Isle, Hiisi Island, and Paha Isle.

achievements.name: Offerings to the Night: Moonlit Isles (I)
achievements.desc: Unlock all the seals on the Kuuhenki's Hidden Troves in the following areas in Nod-Krai: Lempo Isle, Hiisi Island, and Paha Isle.
